content: the perfect crochet cat bed pattern that you can pump out in a weekend start on friday and have your kitty snuggling up in their new bed by sunday evening the finished size is 16 inches in diameter with 14 inches of lounging space for your fuzzy buddy the sides are a comforting 5 inches tall for size idea my cat is 13 pounds and fits perfectly inside ** i made this with a contrasting color for the bottom if you want to do this as well change colors on the sides portion of the pattern on row 3 **what you ll need** 600 grams of super bulky yarn approximately 950 yards i used bernat softee chunky tweeds yarn 10 mm crochet hook tapestry needle
